Text: TYVM Nep and Pdi!  You guys totally rock!

Scanned clean
V-10
A-7
My first ever issue (16 downs). At one point video paused and from that point on the audio was about 2 seconds ahead but it's not enough to deter me by a long shot!!
Nep rules!!!
The video and audio are often slightly out of sync on the Canucks games, I've found.  If you use VLC, it's easy enough to use the track synchronization dialog solve that trivial problem.
